title: One Piece Episode #500 Review
author: The Fandom Post
description: Professional review of Episode 500, noting it wasn't what they expected for the 500th episode milestone but praising the emotional weight of Sabo's separation scene. Rated 3.5/5.

title: Anime Review: One Piece - 500
author: Population GO
description: Review noting the episode's sense of impending doom and praising how Sabo takes center stage, with the storm serving as foreshadowing.

title: 499-504: The Battle Against the Big Tiger to Departures Of Their Own
author: Never Watched One Piece
description: Multi-episode review covering episodes 499-504, including analysis of Episode 500's foreshadowing and emotional impact.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Contains spoilers through Episode 504 covering Sabo's fate

title: One Piece Review: First 500 Episodes and I'm WOWED
author: seki1
description: Retrospective review of the first 500 episodes of One Piece, celebrating the milestone and discussing the series' continuous storyline achievement.
